title: (x) Body copy serif face in redesigned TIME magazine - Proforma {Florian}
content:
Hello,

I know franklin gothic for headlines.

I miss body copy font. ?

Thanks,

Zydrius

comments.content:
Hi Zydrius,

do you have a sample? Otherwise, all I can do is guess (or [perform a search](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113319/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32961) :°): [Proforma](http://web.archive.org/web/20080107113319/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Proforma/charset)?
